description: Triggered on a push to a repository branch. Branch pushes and repository tag pushes also trigger this action.

configSchema.name: owner
configSchema.description: A string that must be the owner of the repository

configSchema.name: repo
configSchema.description: A string that must be the name of the repository

placeholders.name: GitRef
placeholders.description: The full git ref that was pushed (example: 'refs/heads/master')

placeholders.name: GitHead
placeholders.description: The SHA of the most recent commit on GitRef after the push

placeholders.name: GitBefore
placeholders.description: The SHA of the most recent commit on GitRef before the push

placeholders.name: GitNbCommit
placeholders.description: The number of commits in the push
